Title: Postnuclear
Description:
Postnuclear toolkit is a set of reusable features which simplify development of .Net applications:
- in code bindings between properties and expressions
- easy tracking of any change in large structure

It's developed in C# and can be run on .Net 4.0, Silverlight 4.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Postnuclear toolkit is a set of reusable features which simplify development of .Net applications.

Set of features to help you in the process of development:

- small basic classes and helpers

- strongly typed (type safe) weak referencing and weak event handling

- automatic tracking of changes in difficult structures and calculation expressions

- observable collection which allows you to get chained observable subsets

- and more in plans :)

Ð¡heck documentation pages to get main features overview, usage samples and implementation details.
